title: When will they realise we're living in the 20th century?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Conflict management
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Management - Study and teaching
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Trade-unions - Officials and employees
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Trade-unions - Great Britain
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conflict management
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Labor disputes
description: John Cleese plays the roles of both the Shop Steward and the Production Director, each of whom tells his side of the story to the audience regarding a production dispute. As the film proceeds, the mistaken assumptions, actions and attitudes that precipitated the dispute are revealed. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
